textJp: まだ６月だってのに…
暑い。
外ではセミがミンミンと鳴き、夜は蚊まで出る。
…これって完全に夏だよなぁ。
…朝だけは涼しいのが救いか。
textEn: It's only June...
but it's already so hot.
I could hear the higurashi outside chirping "miii miii," and at night, there are mosquitos.
...It might as well be summer already.
...My only salvation was that the mornings were still cool.

textJp: 「暑いでございますわねぇ！」
textEn: "Summer, I do declare!"

textJp: 沙都子が気だるそうにスカートをバタバタさせている。
…はしたないぞ、おい。
…ガキンチョとは言え、一応女の子なんだからさぁ。
textEn: Satoko was flapping her skirt languidly.
...That's pretty unladylike there.
...Even if she was a little brat, she still was a girl.

textJp: 「圭一はワイシャツ１枚で涼しそうですわねぇ…。
羨ましいですわ。」
textEn: "Keiichi does seem quite cool with just a single button-up shirt...
I'm so jealous."

textJp: またこの娘は、いかがわしい想像をたくましくさせてるな…。
textEn: This girl has gone imagining something indecent...

textJp: 「レナの夏服は涼しそうな色合いがいいよな。
見てるこっちも涼しくなる。」
textEn: "Rena's summer clothes have a nice refreshing color.
I feel cooler just looking at them."

textJp: 「あはははは。
ありがと！
本当に涼しいんだよ。」
textEn: "Ahahahaha.
Thank you!
They really do feel pretty cool."

textJp: 「私もレナさんみたいな涼しい夏服がよかったですわねぇ。」
textEn: "I do wish my summer clothes were as breezy as Rena's."

textJp: 「でも沙都子ちゃんの夏服、ワンピースですっごい可愛いし！
レナは沙都子ちゃんの夏服、着てみたいなー☆」
textEn: "But Satoko-chan, your summer clothes are so cute, being a one piece and all!
I'd like to wear your summer clothes.☆"

textJp: 「これ、結構蒸しますわよ？
絶対にレナさんの方が涼しいですわぁ。」
textEn: "This is actually quite stuffy, you know.
I do believe what you're wearing would feel much cooler."

textJp: 「でもかぁいい服の方がきっと楽しいよ。……はぅ！」
textEn: "But it would be so much more fun with kyute clothes... Hao!"

textJp: ……レナと沙都子では根本的に価値観が違う気がするぞ。
textEn: ...I had a feeling that Rena and Satoko's base values were fundamentally different.

textJp: 「そう言えば…、この学校って指定の制服とかないんだよな。」
textEn: "Speaking of which... our school doesn't have a uniform."

textJp: 「うん。
ないよ。
相応しい服であれば私服でも大丈夫なんだよ。」
textEn: "Yeah.
It doesn't.
As long as they're proper, then regular clothes are fine."

textJp: 私服の生徒は確かに多い。
制服を着ている生徒もいるが、みんなデザインは同じ、地味なものだ。
textEn: There are quite a few students in regular clothes.
There were a few wearing uniforms, but they were all the same design and rather plain.

textJp: 「…他の連中が着てる制服は何なんだよ。
みんなお揃いだよな。」
textEn: "...What's the uniform they're all wearing?
They're all the same."

textJp: 「あれは町の学校の制服なんですのよ。
別に決まってるわけじゃないですけど、みんな着てますわね。」
textEn: "That's the city school's uniform.
It's not like there's a rule, but they're all wearing them."

textJp: 「そこへ行くと、俺らの仲間はみんないろいろな制服を着てるよな。
…わざわざどこかから取り寄せたのか？」
textEn: "Speaking of which, everybody in our group is wearing a different uniform, aren't we?
Did you go out of your way to get them from somewhere?"

textJp: 「えぇ。魅音さんが調達して下さいますの。」
textEn: "Why, yes. Mion-san supplied them."

textJp: 「魅ぃちゃんの親類で、古着商をやってる人がいて、全国の学校の服を格安で仕入れてるんですって。」
textEn: "Mii-chan's relative runs a secondhand clothing store. They can get school clothes from all over the country for cheap, they say."

textJp: 「んで、その親類に頼んで、いろいろ個性的な制服を取り寄せてもらってるわけか。」
textEn: "So you asked those relatives to get a bunch of unique school uniforms, then."

textJp: …魅音のヤツ、仲間を着せ替え人形にして楽しんでるな、絶対。
………しかし変な古着屋だよな。
古着全般はわかるとして、全国の学校の服を仕入れてる？
…よくわからん古着屋だ。
遠くの知らない学校の制服など、何の役にも立たないんじゃないのか？？
textEn: ...That Mion, she probably loves using her friends as dress-up dolls.
...That must be a strange secondhand clothing store.
I get that it's a secondhand clothing store, but stocking clothes from schools all over the country?
...That's pretty strange for a secondhand clothing store.
What's the point in stocking up clothes from faraway schools they know nothing about??

textJp: 「…うん。それはレナも思うよ。
他にも体操服とかスクール水着のお古とかも扱ってるの。
…そういうののお古はちょっと嫌だよねぇ。」
textEn: "...Yeah. I think so, too.
They also have used school swimsuits and P.E. uniforms...
I don't like the idea of having used ones."

textJp: 「あんまり儲かってなさそうな商売だな
。……きっと少しでも儲けさせるために、魅音が一肌脱いでやってるんだろうな。」
textEn: "Doesn't sound like that shop makes much money...
They probably have Mion pitch in and help so they can make a bit more."

textJp: 「……でも、いつも魅音さんが自信満々に言いますのよ？
今にきっと大ブレイクしてすごい商売になる！！って。」
textEn: "...But Mion-san says 'It'll be a big hit and become a great store!'
with such conviction."

textJp: ……学校制服の古着屋が大ブレイクねぇ？
…わからん。
textEn: ...A secondhand clothing store that stocks school uniforms will be a big hit?
... I don't get it.
